s.text: And it's hard to believe that if Gore wins the presidency the Democrats won't pick up at least six seats in the House.
I've interviewed Bradley (as part of a group of reporters) a couple of times--he seems like a smart guy with a lively sense of Washington's absurdity.

I've interviewed Bradley (as part of a group of reporters) a couple of times--he seems like a smart guy with a lively sense of Washington's absurdity.
It's not easy to have the same confidence in Gore--one reason his gratuitous gay-litmus-test pander was so disturbing.
